```{r}
df <- read.csv("scripts/20180322_median_nltts.csv")
names(df)
ggplot2::ggplot(
  data = df,
  ggplot2::aes(x = median_nltt, fill = sampling_method)
) + ggplot2::geom_histogram(alpha=.5, position="identity") +
  ggplot2::geom_density(alpha=.5)
```
